name: Spookwright
description:
"Spookwright: Episode 1" tells the story of the famous Twitch streamer, Cutwright!

Cutwright has an amazing stream planned for his birthday. But when he boots up his pc to prepare for the night he realizes that he is locked out of his Twitch account. Luckily he wrote his new password on a note somewhere; he just has to remember where he left it.

Donning his infamous mask, which allows him to spot the hidden notes, Cutwright starts the search. But he soon realizes that he shares his home with some sinister vegetable...

Based on the Cutwright Twitch Channel:

https://www.twitch.tv/cutwright

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

M - Equip Mask

Esc - Pause

E- Interact

Credits

Song : Building Bridges [Royalty Free]

Music provided and produced by LonePeakMusic

Video Link : youtu.be/4bgQFJTSlAY

Credits: Jordan "Cutwright" Woodruff Broccoli Matt_Rushmore Avidmoviegoer - - - Voices by: Roman Flock RevanDanger MightyOblivia - - - Music by: Avidmoviegoer LonePeakMusic - - - Special thanks to: Michael Peel Anthony "Notmor" Davis
